Translations.Text: Tyane vicara karuna eka gosta yojili
Tyaca nasa hovo! Tyane kasi gosta yojili
To punha nasta hovo! Tyane kasi gosta yojili
Maga tyane pahile
Maga tondavara (kapalavara) athya ghatalya ani tonda vakade kele
Maga mage sarakala ani garva kela
Ani mhanala, hi tara phakta jadu ahe, ji sadhya keli jate
(He) manavi kathanakherija anakhi kahi nahi
Mi lavakaraca tyala jahannamamadhye takina
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki jahannama kaya ahe
Ti na baki thevate ani na sodate
Tvacela horapaluna takate
Ani ticyavara ekonisa (phariste tainata) aheta

Ani amhi jahannamace raksaka kevala phariste thevale aheta ani amhi tyanci sankhya kevala kaphirancya kasotikarita nirdharita keli ahe. Yasathi ki granthadharakanni visvasa karava ani imana rakhanaryancya imanata vrd'dhi vhavi ani granthadharaka va muslimanni sansaya karu naye, ani jyancya manata roga ahe tyanni va kaphiranni mhanave ki ya asa udaharanane allahala kaya abhipreta ahe? Asa prakare allaha, jyala icchito margabhrasta karato ani jyala icchito sanmarga dakhavito. Ani tumacya palanakartyacya laskaranna tyacyakherija konihi janata nahi. Ha samasta manavankarita (paripurna) bodha (ani bhala'i) ahe
Kadapi nahi. Candraci sapatha
Ani ratrici jevha ti palatate
Ani pratahkalaci, jevha to prakasamana vhava
Ki (nihsansaya ti jahannama) mothya gostimpaiki eka ahe
Manasala bhayabhita karanari
Tya manasankarita, je tumacyapaiki pudhe ja'u icchitila kinva mage hatu icchitila
Pratyeka manusya apalya karmancya aivaji gahana ahe
Parantu ujavya hatace
(Ki) te jannatimmadhye (basuna) vicarata asatila
Aparadhi lokanna
Tumhala jahannamamadhye konatya gostine takale
Te uttara detila ki amhi namaja padhanare navhato
Bhukelyanna jevu ghalata navhato
Ani amhi nirarthaka gosta (inkara) karanaryansobata nirarthaka gostita vyasta rahata hoto
Ani amhi mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavita hoto
Yetheparyanta ki amaca mrtyu ala
